modified.name: echarts-generate_radar_chart
modified.description: Generate a radar chart to display multidimensional data (four dimensions or more), such as, evaluate Huawei and Apple phones in terms of five dimensions: ease of use, functionality, camera, benchmark scores, and battery life.

value.description: Value of the dimension, such as 70.

group.description: Group name for multiple series, used for comparing different entities

data.description: Data for radar chart, such as, [{ name: 'Design', value: 70 }, { name: 'Performance', value: 85 }] or [{ name: 'Design', value: 70, group: 'iPhone' }].

height.description: Set the height of the chart, default is 600px.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

title.description: Set the title of the chart.

width.description: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.

outputType.description: The output type of the diagram. Can be 'png', 'svg' or 'option'. Default is 'png', 'png' will return the rendered PNG image, 'svg' will return the rendered SVG string, and 'option' will return the valid ECharts option.

modified.name: echarts-generate_scatter_chart
modified.description: Generate a scatter chart to show the relationship between two variables, helps discover their relationship or trends, such as, the strength of correlation, data distribution patterns.

axisXTitle.description: Set the x-axis title of chart.

axisYTitle.description: Set the y-axis title of chart.

x.description: X coordinate value of the data point.

y.description: Y coordinate value of the data point.

data.description: Data for scatter chart, such as, [{ x: 10, y: 15 }, { x: 20, y: 25 }].

height.description: Set the height of the chart, default is 600px.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

title.description: Set the title of the chart.

width.description: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.

outputType.description: The output type of the diagram. Can be 'png', 'svg' or 'option'. Default is 'png', 'png' will return the rendered PNG image, 'svg' will return the rendered SVG string, and 'option' will return the valid ECharts option.

modified.name: echarts-generate_sankey_chart
modified.description: Generate a sankey chart to visualize the flow of data between different stages or categories, such as, the user journey from landing on a page to completing a purchase.

source.description: Source node name, such as 'Landing Page'.

target.description: Target node name, such as 'Product Page'.

value.description: Flow value between source and target, such as 50000.

data.description: Data for sankey chart, such as, [{ source: 'Landing Page', target: 'Product Page', value: 50000 }, { source: 'Product Page', target: 'Add to Cart', value: 35000 }].

height.description: Set the height of the chart, default is 600px.

nodeAlign.description: Alignment of nodes in the sankey chart, such as, 'left', 'right', or 'justify'.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

title.description: Set the title of the chart.

width.description: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.

outputType.description: The output type of the diagram. Can be 'png', 'svg' or 'option'. Default is 'png', 'png' will return the rendered PNG image, 'svg' will return the rendered SVG string, and 'option' will return the valid ECharts option.

modified.name: echarts-generate_funnel_chart
modified.description: Generate a funnel chart to visualize the progressive reduction of data as it passes through stages, such as, the conversion rates of users from visiting a website to completing a purchase.

category.description: Stage category name, such as 'Browse Website'.

value.description: Value at this stage, such as 50000.

data.description: Data for funnel chart, such as, [{ category: 'Browse Website', value: 50000 }, { category: 'Add to Cart', value: 35000 }, { category: 'Generate Order', value: 25000 }].

height.description: Set the height of the chart, default is 600px.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

title.description: Set the title of the chart.

width.description: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.

outputType.description: The output type of the diagram. Can be 'png', 'svg' or 'option'. Default is 'png', 'png' will return the rendered PNG image, 'svg' will return the rendered SVG string, and 'option' will return the valid ECharts option.

modified.name: echarts-generate_gauge_chart
modified.description: Generate a gauge chart to display single indicator's current status, such as, CPU usage rate, completion progress, or performance scores.

value.description: Current value of the indicator, such as 75.

data.description: Data for gauge chart, such as, [{ name: 'CPU Usage', value: 75 }]. Multiple gauges can be displayed.

height.description: Set the height of the chart, default is 600px.

max.description: Maximum value of the gauge, default is 100.

min.description: Minimum value of the gauge, default is 0.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

title.description: Set the title of the chart.

width.description: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.

outputType.description: The output type of the diagram. Can be 'png', 'svg' or 'option'. Default is 'png', 'png' will return the rendered PNG image, 'svg' will return the rendered SVG string, and 'option' will return the valid ECharts option.

modified.name: echarts-generate_treemap_chart
modified.description: Generate a treemap chart to display hierarchical data and can intuitively show comparisons between items at the same level, such as, show disk space usage with treemap.

data.description: Data for treemap chart, such as, [{ name: 'Design', value: 70, children: [{ name: 'Tech', value: 20 }] }].

height.description: Set the height of the chart, default is 600px.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

title.description: Set the title of the chart.

width.description: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.

outputType.description: The output type of the diagram. Can be 'png', 'svg' or 'option'. Default is 'png', 'png' will return the rendered PNG image, 'svg' will return the rendered SVG string, and 'option' will return the valid ECharts option.

modified.name: echarts-generate_sunburst_chart
modified.description: Generate a sunburst chart to display multi-level hierarchical data, such as, organizational structure, file system hierarchy, or category breakdown.

data.description: Data for sunburst chart, such as, [{ name: 'Technology', value: 100, children: [{ name: 'Frontend', value: 60, children: [{ name: 'React', value: 30 }] }] }].

height.description: Set the height of the chart, default is 600px.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

title.description: Set the title of the chart.

width.description: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.

outputType.description: The output type of the diagram. Can be 'png', 'svg' or 'option'. Default is 'png', 'png' will return the rendered PNG image, 'svg' will return the rendered SVG string, and 'option' will return the valid ECharts option.

modified.name: echarts-generate_heatmap_chart
modified.description: Generate a heatmap chart to display data density or intensity distribution, such as, user activity patterns by time and day, or correlation matrix.

axisXTitle.description: Set the x-axis title of chart.

axisYTitle.description: Set the y-axis title of chart.

x.description: X axis value, such as 'Mon' or 0.

y.description: Y axis value, such as 'AM' or 0.

value.description: Heat value at this position, such as 5.

data.description: Data for heatmap chart, such as, [{ x: 'Mon', y: '12AM', value: 5 }, { x: 'Tue', y: '1AM', value: 3 }].

height.description: Set the height of the chart, default is 600px.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

title.description: Set the title of the chart.

width.description: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.

outputType.description: The output type of the diagram. Can be 'png', 'svg' or 'option'. Default is 'png', 'png' will return the rendered PNG image, 'svg' will return the rendered SVG string, and 'option' will return the valid ECharts option.

modified.name: echarts-generate_candlestick_chart
modified.description: Generate a candlestick chart for financial data visualization, such as, stock prices, cryptocurrency prices, or other OHLC (Open-High-Low-Close) data.

data.description: Data for candlestick chart, such as, [{ date: '2023-01-01', open: 100, high: 110, low: 95, close: 105, volume: 10000 }].

height.description: Set the height of the chart, default is 600px.

showVolume.description: Whether to show volume chart below candlestick. Default is false.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

title.description: Set the title of the chart.

width.description: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.

outputType.description: The output type of the diagram. Can be 'png', 'svg' or 'option'. Default is 'png', 'png' will return the rendered PNG image, 'svg' will return the rendered SVG string, and 'option' will return the valid ECharts option.

modified.name: echarts-generate_boxplot_chart
modified.description: Generate a boxplot chart to show data for statistical summaries among different categories, such as, comparing the distribution of data points across categories.

axisXTitle.description: Set the x-axis title of chart.

axisYTitle.description: Set the y-axis title of chart.

category.description: Category of the data point, such as 'Category A'.

value.description: Value of the data point, such as 10.

group.description: Optional group for the data point, used for grouping in the boxplot.

data.description: Data for boxplot chart, such as, [{ category: 'Category A', value: 10 }, { category: 'Category B', value: 20, group: 'Group A' }].

height.description: Set the height of the chart, default is 600px.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

title.description: Set the title of the chart.

width.description: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.

outputType.description: The output type of the diagram. Can be 'png', 'svg' or 'option'. Default is 'png', 'png' will return the rendered PNG image, 'svg' will return the rendered SVG string, and 'option' will return the valid ECharts option.

modified.name: echarts-generate_graph_chart
modified.description: Generate a network graph chart to show relationships (edges) between entities (nodes), such as, relationships between people in social networks.

value.description: Value associated with the node (affects size).

nodes.description: Array of nodes in the network.

value.description: Weight or value of the edge.

data.description: Data for network graph chart, such as, { nodes: [{ id: 'node1', name: 'Node 1' }], edges: [{ source: 'node1', target: 'node2' }] }

height.description: Set the height of the chart, default is 600px.

layout.description: Layout algorithm for the graph. Default is 'force'.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

title.description: Set the title of the chart.

width.description: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.

outputType.description: The output type of the diagram. Can be 'png', 'svg' or 'option'. Default is 'png', 'png' will return the rendered PNG image, 'svg' will return the rendered SVG string, and 'option' will return the valid ECharts option.

modified.name: echarts-generate_parallel_chart
modified.description: Generate a parallel coordinates chart to display multi-dimensional data, such as, comparing different products across multiple attributes.

name.description: Name or identifier for this data series.

values.description: Array of values for each dimension.

data.description: Data for parallel chart, such as, [{ name: 'Product A', values: [4.2, 3.4, 2.3, 1.8] }].

dimensions.description: Names of the dimensions/axes, such as, ['Price', 'Quality', 'Service', 'Value'].

height.description: Set the height of the chart, default is 600px.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

title.description: Set the title of the chart.

width.description: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.

outputType.description: The output type of the diagram. Can be 'png', 'svg' or 'option'. Default is 'png', 'png' will return the rendered PNG image, 'svg' will return the rendered SVG string, and 'option' will return the valid ECharts option.

modified.name: echarts-generate_tree_chart
modified.description: Generate a tree chart to display hierarchical data structure, such as, organizational chart, family tree, or file directory structure.

data.description: Tree data structure, such as, { name: 'Root', children: [{ name: 'Child 1' }, { name: 'Child 2' }] }.

height.description: Set the height of the chart, default is 600px.

orient.description: Tree orientation. LR=left-to-right, RL=right-to-left, TB=top-to-bottom, BT=bottom-to-top. Default is 'LR'.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

title.description: Set the title of the chart.

width.description: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.

outputType.description: The output type of the diagram. Can be 'png', 'svg' or 'option'. Default is 'png', 'png' will return the rendered PNG image, 'svg' will return the rendered SVG string, and 'option' will return the valid ECharts option.

modified.name: weather-get-alerts
modified.description: Get weather alerts for a US state

state.description: Two-letter US state code (e.g. CA, NY)

modified.name: weather-get-forecast
modified.description: Get weather forecast for a location in the US
